title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid credentials via Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm that registration completes successfully and user is redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify that registration fails if the user inputs an invalid email format.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input username and password, and provide an invalid email format.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that the system prevents submission and displays an appropriate error message about invalid email.

title: User Login Success
description: Check that a registered user can successfully log in with correct credentials through Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered email and password.
Click the login button.
Ensure user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure the system rejects login attempts with an incorrect password.

steps.description: Go to the login page.
Enter valid email and incorrect password.
Attempt to log in.
Verify login fails and appropriate error message is shown.

title: Profile Editing and Saving Updates
description: Test user can open profile edit modal, modify profile details, and save successfully with data validated by Supabase.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Account page.
Open the ProfileEditModal.
Modify profile information such as display name and avatar.
Save changes.
Ensure updates persist and are reflected correctly in user profile data.

title: Link Minecraft Account Successfully
description: Validate that a user can link their Minecraft account with the web platform and skin displays correctly.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Verify page.
Initiate Minecraft account linking process.
Complete verification steps for Minecraft identity.
Confirm Minecraft account is linked and skin viewer displays current skin.

title: Link Discord Account and Synchronize Roles
description: Ensure Discord account linkage works and roles assigned in Discord synchronize properly with the platform.

steps.description: Access Verify page after login.
Link Discord account via OAuth flow.
Verify roles on Discord are synchronized and displayed accurately in user profile.

title: Dashboard Displays Correct User Statistics
description: Check that the dashboard accurately reflects real-time user statistics, achievements, and playstyle radar chart.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Dashboard page.
Verify user statistics data correctness and that the PlaystyleRadar and AchievementsList components render with proper data.

title: Dashboard Seasonal Timeline Accuracy
description: Ensure the SeasonalTimeline component on the dashboard reflects accurate seasonal events and timelines.

steps.description: On the Dashboard page, observe the SeasonalTimeline.
Verify the timeline correctly displays season start/end dates and achievements unlocked during the season.

title: Forum Thread Creation with Markdown Content
description: Validate that users can create new forum threads supporting markdown syntax without data loss.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to a ForumCategory page.
Create a new thread using markdown formatted text in the post editor.
Submit the new thread.
Check that the thread appears correctly with markdown rendered content.

title: Forum Poll Creation and Voting
description: Ensure users can create polls within forum threads and that voting functions properly with accurate vote tally updates.

steps.description: Create a new thread with a poll in the Forum.
Cast votes from one or multiple users.
Verify poll updates votes count real-time and displays results accurately.

title: Forum Thread Pagination and Navigation
description: Test pagination of forum threads within a category to ensure smooth navigation and loading of content.

steps.description: Navigate to a ForumCategory page with many threads.
Click through pagination controls to browse threads.
Confirm correct threads load with each pagination action without errors.

title: Admin Panel: User Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify that administrator can perform create, read, update, and delete operations on user accounts through the UsersManager component.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open AdminPanel.
Access UsersManager and create a new user entry.
Confirm that the new user is added and visible in the users list.
Edit details of an existing user.
Verify that user details update correctly.
Delete a user.
Ensure the user is removed from the list.

title: Admin Panel: Support Tickets Management
description: Check adminâ€™s ability to view, update status, assign, and resolve support tickets via TicketsManager.

steps.description: Access TicketsManager through AdminPanel.
Open a support ticket.
Change ticket status and assign to a user.
Confirm updates are saved and visible in ticket details.

title: Admin Panel: News Publishing Workflow
description: Verify the NewsForm allows admins to create, edit, and publish news articles with correct CRUD behavior.

steps.description: Open NewsForm component.
Create a new news article with title, body, and publication date.
Save and publish the article.
Ensure article appears correctly on public news feed.
Edit the news article and save changes.
Verify updated article displays changes accurately.

title: Economy: Virtual Currency Purchase and Balance Update
description: Confirm that users can purchase virtual currency using app payment methods and their account balance updates accordingly.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Economy section.
Initiate purchase of virtual currency.
Complete payment process.
Verify user virtual currency balance increases by purchased amount.

title: Economy: Gacha Draw Execution and Result Recording
description: Test the gacha draw functionality works correctly, deducts virtual currency, and records obtained items properly.

steps.description: Ensure user has sufficient virtual currency.
Perform a gacha draw.
Verify currency deduction, draw result display, and update to user's inventory.

title: Economy: Donation Tracking and Reporting
description: Ensure donation transactions are tracked accurately and reflected in user donation history and admin donation manager.

steps.description: Make a donation via the app.
Confirm donation record updates in user history and visible in DonationsManager for admins.

title: Component Library: UI Components Render Correctly in Storybook
description: Verify all UI components in the library render correctly in Storybook across supported browsers including edge case props and states.

steps.description: Open Storybook and browse all UI components.
Confirm components render visually without errors and match design for normal, hover, disabled, and error states.

title: Component Library: Responsive Behavior and Edge Case Testing
description: Test key UI components handle edge cases such as extremely long texts, empty states, and responsiveness to different screen sizes.

steps.description: Use Storybook examples or manual tests to apply long strings, truncated content, and empty data to components.
Resize window or simulate mobile viewports.
Ensure components manage layout gracefully without breaking or overflowing and maintain usability.

title: Authentication: Session Expiry and Auto Logout
description: Test that user sessions expire as expected and users are prompted or logged out automatically when session expires.

steps.description: Log in and remain idle until session expiration threshold is met.
Verify user is either automatically logged out or prompted to reauthenticate.

title: Game Integrations: Handling Invalid or Expired Tokens
description: Verify platform correctly handles errors when Minecraft or Discord tokens are invalid or expired during syncing.

steps.description: Attempt to synchronize roles or skin data with an invalid or expired token.
Verify user receives a clear error message and is prompted to reauthenticate to renew tokens.

title: Forum: Markdown Injection and XSS Prevention
description: Verify forum markdown rendering sanitizes input to prevent cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Create a forum post containing malicious script tags within markdown content.
Confirm that when rendered, the script does not execute and is either escaped or removed safely.

title: Admin Panel: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure only users with admin roles can access admin functionalities, and non-admins are blocked.

steps.description: Attempt to access AdminPanel with an unauthorized user account.
Verify access is denied and redirected or shown an error message.
Access AdminPanel with an admin user.
Verify full functionality is accessible and operational.
